name: The Dead Forest
description:
The dead forest is a short fps retro game in which you explore the forest to try to solve the local village's curse.

This game was made for the Brackys Game Jam 2023.1. It's a bit buggy and I bit off more than I could chew, but I'm still happy with what I accomplished in a short time since it's one of my first game jams! (at least visually) I might even make an actual game in this art style in the future.
